caption.p: VGCV decreases Ad5 and Ad6 virus burden in the ( A) liver, ( B) lungs, and ( C) kidney of immunosuppressed Syrian hamsters. Each symbol represents the value from an individual animal; the horizontal bar signifies the mean. NQ: not quantifiable; ND: not detectable. Significance was not calculated because of not detectable (not scalar) levels in the VGCV-treated groups.
